dimension: 43 1/2 x 50 1/2 in. (110.49 x 128.27 cm) (at bottom edge)
title: Skirt
description: black with separated rows of colorful, applied patchwork squares made of two triangles; bands of embroidery between the three rows; below this is a wide band of embroidery with some yellow metal couching; this is followed by 5-1/2\" band of indigo batik at lower edge; wide, 8-3/4\" black waistband; heavy
creditline: The Ruth Ann Dayton Chinese Room Endowment Fund, The Suzanne S. Roberts Fund for Asian Art, and The Helen Jones Fund for Asian Art
